history.proof: intros A h x y Hle Hx. destruct h as [h h_proof]. simpl in *. induction y. - sauto lq: on depth: 3. - destruct (Nat.eq_dec x (S y)). ++ subst. auto. ++ apply h_proof with (x := x) (y := S y). + sfirstorder depth: 3. + qsimpl time: 1.

ctx: intros A h x y Hle Hx.
exceptions.exn: The reference lia was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros A h x y Hle Hx.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros A h x y Hle Hx.
apply h_proof with (x := x) (y := S y).
exceptions.exn: The reference lia was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros A h x y Hle Hx.
apply h_proof with (x := x) (y := S y).
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros A h x y Hle Hx.
apply h_proof with (x := x) (y := S y).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type h : nat -> option A h_proof : forall x y : nat, x < y -> h x = None -> h y = None x, y : nat Hle : x <= S y Hx : h x = None IHy : x <= y -> h y = None n : x <> S y Unable to unify "h y = None" with "h x = None".

ctx: intros A h x y Hle Hx.
apply h_proof with (x := x) (y := S y).

original: intros A h x y Hle Hx. destruct h as [h h_proof]. simpl in *. induction y. - assert (x = 0) by lia. subst. auto. - destruct (Nat.eq_dec x (S y)). ++ subst. auto. ++ apply h_proof with (x := x) (y := S y). + lia. + apply IHy. lia.
